long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlite is a streamlined browser extension designed for researchers, students, journalists, and avid online readers. It enables quick text highlighting and snippet-saving on any web page without disrupting your reading flow. Kindle owners will feel right at home.

Effortlessly export your highlights to a file or copy them to your clipboard for easy integration with your preferred tools.

Highlite is different from other extensions with its emphasis on speed, privacy, and elegant design. There are no user accounts, sign-up requirements, data collection, or unnecessary features. The entire extension is incredibly lightweight, occupying just 47kB.

Highlite caters to users seeking a straightforward and efficient text highlighting tool, avoiding unnecessary complexity. It's ideal for those who want a lightweight extension that won't bog down their system or hinder browsing performance.

To begin using Highlite, simply activate it on any web page and start highlighting. Easily manage your snippets within the Highlite panel for the current page, and when you're done, instantly copy or export your collection.

Note: Highlite is still in early testing. If you would like to help contribute your feedback, please take this 3 minute Typeform: https://joijwriskpe.typeform.com/to/UvXE98tA
